Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: strong heart
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: This heart is built for a larger body, and pumps a lot of blood. It also tires people out.

li.description: A painful spasm of a growing heart is burning in [PAWN_nameDef]'s chest.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s heart has grown in size and the surrounding chest cavity has expanded to make room. [PAWN_pronoun] will need to rest more often, however.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: bellowing lung
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A large, powerful lung for intensive breathing. Causes

li.description: A painful spasm of growing lungs is burning in [PAWN_nameDef]'s chest.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s lungs have grown in size and the surrounding chest cavity has expanded to make room. The larger size leads to hyperventilation, causing slight dizziness.
